name: Slice'n'Dice
description:
Tutorial:

  • Left click and drag dice to use them
  • Right click dice to discard them
  • Use dice from the red slot to damage enemies within your attack range (denoted by the red circle around you while they are held)
  • Use dice from the blue slot to move(the distance is dependent on the dice's value, and is shown in the blue circle displayed when they are held)
  • Dice from the yellow slot can be used for either purpose, but at half efficiency

WARNING! Some browsers may not support fullscreen!
